operations.content:
# Web App Fixture

## Install

```bash
python -m pip install -e .[dev]
```

## Run

```bash
python -m web_app_fixture.app
```

[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=69", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "web-app-fixture"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Minimal web app fixture"
requires-python = ">=3.11"
dependencies = []

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = ["pytest==8.2.0", "ruff==0.5.0", "mypy==1.10.0", "build==1.2.1"]

[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = {"" = "src"}

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src"]

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py311"

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP", "N"]

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
pythonpath = ["src"]

Web App Fixture

Static page scaffold.

"""Tests for the web app fixture."""

from web_app_fixture.app import load_index


def test_load_index_contains_heading() -> None:
    """Ensure the static HTML includes the heading."""
    assert "Web App Fixture" in load_index()
